channel.title: Projects on Joshia Cahyadi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Joshia Cahyadi

item.title: Project 3 (Personal): Recommendation System Based on Articles Content
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Libraries Preprocessing Term Frequency - Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF) Non-Negative Matrix Factorization The Recommendation System References Introduction The advanced progress in technology has significantly affect nowadays life, including our ways and considerations in choosing something. Usually, when we want to buy food, drinks, or any other item via an online application, we will get recommendations from the app that make us consider buying them. The feature that generates recommendations for us is called the recommendation system.

item.title: Project 1: Analysis of the Indonesian Economy and Recommendations for Placement of UMKMs based on Geolocation and Social Media Sentiments in Jakarta
item.description: The emergence of COVID-19 pandemic in early 2020, caused the Indonesian economy hit hard. With the pandemic lasting almost 2 years, it is necessary to know the current condition of the Indonesian economy in order to know the progress of Indonesia. In this project, we analyzed one of the main keys to the Indonesian economy, namely UMKM. We also keen to see the distribution of mapping and public opinion about UMKM in Jakarta.

item.title: Project 2: NFT Creator Recommendations & Dashboard
item.description: Non-Fungible Token (NFT), one of the biggest phenomena in late 2021, has stormed the digital marketplace. The NFT’s phenomenon influenced various societies, especially artists and influencers. In addition to them, many organizations also started to create their original NFT projects and collections for many purposes, such as engaging their fans in this online era. Unfortunately, not everyone who started NFT projects has succeeded. Most of them failed to maintain and continue their NFT projects.
